entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
